data.title: Sandra St. Victor
data.meta_description:
Sanctuary by Sandra St. Victor, released 28 May 2018

1. Satisfy Me
2. Deep River
3. Love Is
4. I'll Never Open My Legs Again
5. lude
6. Plight Of A Woman
7. deluded #2
8. Springtime In Hell
9. Building Bridges
10. Whatever You Want
11. Nothing Left To Give
12. lude #3
13. Follow Your Heart
14. Sanctuary
15. Building Bridges outro
16. bonus 1 Love Is (demo)
17. bonus 2 Follow Your Heart (demo)

-unreleased 1993 album-
data.text:
1.

Satisfy Me 04:32

Satisfy Me Everything around us tries to break us down and it's so hard not to put up that wall Yeah! Everybody wants one Yeah! Everybody wants two aw come on What I want I want, and what you want you want, forget about love You want it hot but cold, a river from your snow, well it just ain't enough Well if we really said what's on our minds I don't need to justify, I ain't got time No words or explanations here, or questions why Satisfy me Satisfy me Everybody wants one Satisfy me Satisfy me Everybody wants two Ooh the hourglass is running mighty fast, can we get to the point Is it all too much, you never meant to touch, hit me right there You drip a little love and then you pour Still even you could give a little more I'll be the one to make your faucet sore Satisfy me Satisfy me Everybody wants one Satisfy me Satisfy me Everybody wants two Everything around us tries to break us down and it's so hard not to put up that wall But everything inside you's got to hold on to that thing Cause no one, hardly no one wants to give it all Give it all give at all Satisfy me Satisfy me Everybody wants one Satisfy me Satisfy me Everybody wants two

2.

Deep River 04:56

Deep River Oh run run run Oh run run run Run through me, where you are I will find Deep River, from my mouth to my south... and I want you inside Rowing down your Nile, I thought about the file of little streams I'd been before, they were nothing more, my Mississippi Delta felt cha. Honey, did I melt cha from a mountaintop, like me from below Did rain fall down, form on the ground from a cloud of tears, then come sweet and thick, milk honey rich, to the ocean of me Deep River, run through me, run to me. Where you are I will find Deep River, from my mouth to my south... and I want you inside deep River river run river river run River river run river river run Yes, the dams been opened, all of my emotions are rushing straight to you and I knew you knew that man, but uhh You don't where I've been, and the biggest sin, was I was there too long my own little desert storm The rain came down, formed on the ground from a cloud of tears, then sweet, thick, honey rich, to the ocean of me Deep River, run through me, run to me Where you are I will find Deep River, from my mouth to my south... and I want you inside deep Deep River, run through me, run to me Where you are I will find Deep River, from my mouth to my south... and I want you inside deep Roll me through your rushes I won't drown, won'w be afraid Baptize me over again Take me to, to that quiet place Oh run run run Oh run run run Run through me, where you are I will find Deep River, from my mouth to my south... and I want you inside deep River river run river river run River river run river river run

3.

Love Is 04:15

Love Is can you give me true love do you know what love is can you give me true love I know you're never lost for words and now you're quiet how can that be I wanna know your heart, or is that selfish of me Loving you is like loving a rare Van Gogh, seeing what you want my eyes to see, never being part of me And I've waited oh so long for heaven's sake Seven years and I'll keep holding on, what will it take Love is rushing through a field of roses where we lie Love is leaping off a mountaintop until we fly Love is waiting where the sands of time and oceans kiss Now until forever, know wherever you are love is Now can you give me true love Now come and tell me what you feel and I won't let it hurt you Trust me I'll be here, and all the pain I'll undo All the planets say the plan is clear for us to be one and I won't let it get away Love is rushing through a field of roses where we lie Love is leaping off a mountaintop until we fly Love is waiting where the sands of time and oceans kiss Now until forever, know wherever you are love is Love is rushing through a field of roses where we lie Love is standing on a mountain watching eagles fly Love is waiting where the angels and the dreamers kiss Hold my hand forever, wherever we are, LOVE So much sadness in the world We need a solace to get by Nothings lost that we can't lose It won't hurt us if we try Peace is no result of wealth You've got to know your inner self Feel the strong vibrations of human nature giving love Nothin' but love love, love love Nothin' but love love, love love Nothin' but love Love is rushing through a field of roses where we lie Love is leaping off a mountaintop until you fly Love is waiting where the angels and the dreamers kiss Now until forever, know wherever you are Love is rushing through a field of roses where we lie Love is standing on a mountain watching eagles fly Love is waiting where the sands of time and oceans kiss Hold my hand forever am I racing through your mind we been wasting so much time caress your spirit sweet and with the river running deep don't wan you go nowhere so much left fah we to share and don't you be afraid Love is

4.

I'll Never Open My Legs Again There's more to me than what you see not just your favorite part of me so check this out I'll never open my legs again to a man who's insecure I'll never open my legs again, unless I'm really sure I'll never, no I'll never ever ever If I can't trust you with my heart, why should I trust you with the skins Sad but true I slept with you I thought we were in love (my eyes were blind) You're passive yet aggressive too, at first it was enough (you blew my mind) There you sit quietly sending sexual vibes They're saying you want this, you need this, with no real sense of me There's more to me than what you see and not just your favorite part of me I'll never open my legs again to a man who's insecure I'll never open my legs again, unless I'm really sure I'll never, no I'll never ever ever If I can't trust you with my heart, why should I trust you with the skins Nothing but the best of me I gave with open arms (I loved you so) It's over well, I'm back from helming released of your sweet charms (but here we go) Scene 23, the exit fade to black and man I'm so Leary, so weary Why did you come back The scars will fade, I'll be OK, so hey, leave the past to yesterday I'll never open my legs again to a man who's insecure I'll never open my legs again, unless I'm really sure Never

5.

lude 00:43

6.

Plight Of A Woman 05:26

Plight of a Woman I wouldn't have a chance without a poet's heart. I wouldn't have a prayer of survival. With every man I loved, I wrote myself so neatly safe in self denial. I am never sorry, never wrong. I kept emotions in my songs. I'm never weak, I'm always strong. When I'm in love, I don't stay long. I find protection my defense against a world of helplessness. I've learned to straddle every fence. I hold the hands of time securely to my breast massaging memories in quest of happiness. I won't take bribes. I will not die to keep you satisfied. I scream and pant through every line, releasing poison with every autograph I sign. I wouldn't have a chance without a poet's heart. Just Don't Compare Me To The Blues. Sarah smile, no Sarah frown cause Sarah loves a juvenile not in numbers but in mind She needs to leave him, just bereave him, he's robbing her emotions blind her fragile is left behind It's the plight of every woman once a mother said Light a candle everyone for every tear we've shed If a mother says a daughter just ignore the signs It's the plight of every woman til the end of time Traumatized and dramatized, but never rightly equalized Turn each page of borrowed time to see that History's no mystery, hear what it's saying his story Well what should we expect to find It's the plight of every woman once a mother said Light a candle everyone for every tear we've shed If a mother says a daughter just ignore the signs It's the plight of every woman til the end of time and ooh how it hurts when a girl becomes aware, what will she be a secret world unfolds, the innocence dies but nothing earthly or unearthly can compare, such a beauty to the understanding eyes of a woman growing wise So many of us are feeling at the end of our hope But I'm here to tell you, we got a whole lot more than hope Lisa, Carol, Karen, Helen, Faybiene Miranda, Chantal, Chaka Listen when the little sisters speak, Maanami, Chiriqui, Camae, Candice, Imani Vicky, Nona, Deborah, Dierdre, Lee, Lace, Cindy, Biti, Cecilia As the winds of change blow in our direction, we the breath of life pray for peace, love and protection It's the plight of every woman once a mother said Light a candle everyone for every tear we've shed If a mother says a daughter just ignore the signs It's the plight of every woman til the end of time Sarah smile, smile for me Sarah smile, smile for you

7.

deluded #2 00:34

8.

Springtime In Hell 05:16

Springtime In Hell Let’s say we give this fool a heart He knows not the things he’s done And from the fire, there’s still a spark and more cliches yet to come We’ll cry on hey but move on all is well There’s sunshine and new leaves, and songs to tell, and it’s it’s It’s springtime springtime Springtime in hell Doesn’t the broken glass look like stars reflecting off the ground Let’s make our empty wishes here Might as well, can’t look up, so let’s see what’s down It’s all alright, yeah, it’s alright I’ll build from this shell There’s sunshine and new leaves, brand songs to tell, and it’s, it’s It’s springtime springtime Springtime in hell Do you make victims so you won’t be one yourself That was easy, you could have told that to yourself Yes our loves been like the war around us South central ain’t got nothing on my heart in my heart Cause I’ve cried on and I’ve move on and all is well There’s sunshine and new leaves, songs to tell It’s springtime springtime It’s alright, it’s alright, we’ll build from this shell Sunshine and new leaves, songs to tell Springtime in hell it’s alright everything gonna have to be alright come on let’s build from this shell hey... oh my heart

9.

Building Bridges 04:51

Building Bridges hey hey hey hey ... building bridges Is it true, they wanna know, well is it so I'll tell it now, listen, come on, hey, I say, watch the moon Is it hanging low, does it cease it's glow, or is it in Scorpio They were building bridges over miles of desert sand With a voice and vision, with the will to take a stand They were building bridges, to escape the devil's hand, now tell me Who's gonna lead us to the promised land Heed the signs, when the sky falls down no shelter can be found hear me now I say, will you go Will you be there for us all, or break the chain Don't break the chain They were building bridges over miles of desert sand With a voice and vision, with the will to take a stand They were building bridges, to escape the devil's hand, now tell me Who's gonna lead us to the promised land She closed her eyes, yeah she closed her eyes Now the storm has risen, no sleep as heaven cries So go on with your tunnel vision, truth's a leper to your soul Changed the wine to water, turned the straw to gold They were building bridges over miles of desert sand With a voice and vision, with the will to take a stand They were building bridges, to escape the devil's hand, now tell me Who's gonna lead ya They were building bridges over miles of desert sand With a voice and vision, and a will to take a stand They were building bridges, to escape the devil's hand, now tell me Who's gonna lead ya Who's gonna lead ya to the promised land Who's gonna lead ya now

10.

Whatever You Want 05:29

11.

Nothing Left To Give 04:53

Nothing Left To Give Once you were the best of me, the only one I watched you walk your life, when all I knew was how to run You put me on a pedestal then left me all alone You watched me turn to stone Long ago a sweet sweet song was what we used to sing A song from the book of love, we laughed at everything We gave from May to May, we gave through night and day, and now we cannot say why we're cold Is there nothing left oh To be loved to be loving is what you make it when there's two people giving more than they're taking Til there's nothing left give, nothing left to take or give Comes a time when a woman deserves a saviour Comes a time when a man needs a hand to save her when there's nothing to give Nothing left for us to give No we didn't ask for it, autumns in the air Like a tree chokes a thirsty leaf, what's left of love is dangling somewhere Let's bury it with flowers and treat it with respect, for hanging around us so long when there's nothing left Long ago a sweet sweet song washed away the dirt A song from the book of love the best I'd ever heard We gave from May to May, we gave through night and day, and now we cannot say why we're cold, we're so cold, I'm so cold To be loved to be loving is what you make it when there's two people giving more than they're taking Til there's nothing left give, nothing left to take or give Comes a time when a woman deserves a saviour Come a time when a man needs a hand to save her when there's nothing to give, nothing left to take or give Used to feel the colours of the rainbow, now we're faded down to gray and woh I Nothing left to give, nothing left to take or give Satisfied my hunger every part of me then, chased the blues straight to my heart then, when Nothing left to give, nothing left for us to To be loved to be loving is what you make it when there's two people giving more than they're taking Til there's nothing left give, nothing left to take or give Comes a time when a woman deserves a saviour Comes a time when a man needs a hand to save her when there's nothing to give, nothing left for us to give Come on let's bury it with flowers Kiss and love me til the final hour nothing to give, nothing left for us to give Long ago I heard your sweet sweet song and oh I nothing to give, nothing left to give Inside your heart, beside your soul is where I know I need I wanna belong, but I know I nothing to give, when there's nothing left to give Long ago I heard your sweet sweet song and oh I

12.

lude #3 00:31

13.

Follow Your Heart 04:27

Follow Your Heart Is it any wonder a river finds the sea Is it any wonder you dream a world and it comes to be Is it any wonder the sea of love hiding in me has come alive Is it any wonder your river flows and becomes a life Follow your heart into the dreams that guide you and you will find your way Follow your heart and if it seems to blind you then close your eyes and say I have no fear Follow your heart This feeling that I'm under is all I want and more So is it any wonder you dream of showers and rain will pour Is it any wonder where once a heart felt so insecure is now complete Is it any wonder that loves as strong as your lips are sweet Follow your heart into the dreams that guide you and you will find your way Follow your heart and if it seems to blind you then close your eyes and say I have no fear no no no Follow your heart

14.

Sanctuary 05:11

Sanctuary In an ageless dream where love is pure and true I escape to you, my sanctuary Loving you in silence, mmm Knowing that it's right Under your gaze should a storm arise Unbothered by the chaos swirling 'round outside In a place where just your face is all I see Where the love we make intoxicates intensively In a mirror where your sweet reflection used to be there is hope, there is joy, there is sanctuary We've found our sanctuary in a never-ending kiss You give me sanctuary and my soul has found a place to peacefully exist Sanctuary yeah and nothing compares to this I'll be your sanctuary Sanctuary We perform a sacred ritual right there in the dark A sacrificial offering of my fidelity A solemn oath of faithfulness I give to thee down at your feet The reassurance in your rhythm, hesitation disappears As you scream my name over and over like a prayer Out of shadows in the dark I open up and you are there touching me deep, so deep in my sanctuary We've found our sanctuary in a never-ending kiss You give me sanctuary and my soul has found a place to peacefully exist Sanctuary yeah and nothing compares to this I'll be your sanctuary Passion fascination sweet serenity grow unmolested in my garden Mango and nectarine sweet honeydew and all you give to me, ooh I love the taste of you We've found our sanctuary in a never-ending kiss You give me sanctuary and my soul has found a place to peacefully exist Sanctuary yeah and nothing compares to this I'll be your sanctuary In a place where just your face is all I see Where the love we make intoxicates intensively In a mirror where your sweet reflection used to be there is only sanctuary

15.

Building Bridges outro 01:01

16.
